page.title: 16"Children of the World"
page.content: It was quite an honour for the school to be invited to join in a venture to create a record in aid of the {Save The Children Fund.}For weeks we had been watching T.V. pictures of starving children in Ethiopia and the Sudan and now we could do something about it. After auditions a dozen or so boys and girls were invited to the "Music Factory" Recording Studio at Parkgate in Rotherham.Kevin McVann was to record his song "Children of the World" and one of our parents,John Pickles, was to sing his own composition "Save the Children" with the Barnburgh pupils providing the backing for both songs. Mrs Buxton had done a good job and the end product sounded very professional.It was a tremendous experience in aid of a worthy cause.
